products.title: Sio Merino Navy 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their sio collection intruduces stylish modern patterns to your window dressing. Their sio meriono navy will make a chic addition to your home. Pair with dark wooden tones throughout the home for a look that can not be surpassed. The polyester fabric is decorative whilst providing a sleek and practical window covering. products.title: Bari Spc, Merino - Vertical Blind
products.description: For a traditional yet modern window display, opt for the bari spc merino, a contemporary blind with adjustable louvres. This practical feature allows you to move the slats accordingly, filtering the desired amount of light and breeze. And if that wasn't enough, this quality fabric also carries a solar protective coating that repels the suns heat without affecting the fabric. Use the merino in your master bedroom to form a sophisticated colour scheme.

products.title: Sio Merino
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 4115mm min drop: 300mm max drop: 2913mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
